divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my yard under a tree when I heard a small plane flying over,Ilooked up through the tree and saw something falling out of the plane.Ithought what? sky -litterbugs? I stepped out from under the tree to get a look and saw a mottled graphite diamond shaped craft.It was sightly below the planestail and following it.Shocked I thought What is that thing? As soon as I thoughtthis ,the object STOPPED!When it stopped it started to quiver.I thought I haveto really observe this thing.Chicken that I am I did not watch long.It was abouttwenty feet long ,the length of the small plane wing. Though diamond in shape,itwas an elongated diamond with the horizonal points nipped off.As mentionedbefore it was mottled graphite ,and as it hovered it shook like a bowl full ofjelly.I would like to say I watched this thing until disappeared3Bhowever I folded went and into my home,like it was a save place.I do not knowwhat happened to my ufo.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lake St Louis
There were no other sightings in Lake St Louis on or around July 31st 1999
